originalText.text: We needed help with various renovations in our new home, including installing a recessed medicine cabinet and light fixture, and handyman Carnegie Hill came in very handy. They employed excellent subcontractors who were incredibly honest and helped us save money by pointing out things that didn't truly need to be done or that could be done in a different way. Scheduling and billing went without a hitch. Without a doubt, we'd utilize them again.

originalText.text: I am very amazed with Handyman Carnegie Hill and the team they sent us. We saved a lot by listening to their opinion. We had our kitchen renovated just two weeks ago and instead of having the cabinets replaced, they suggested that we better have them reface. And the results? They’re the best!! Thanks guys!!

We had our kitchen renovated just two weeks ago and instead of having the cabinets replaced, they suggested that we better have them reface. And the results? They’re the best!! Thanks guys!!

originalText.text: the company is an excellent handyman, very dependable, on time and on budget.. He installed a new head and handles in the shower stall, a new and much quieter ceiling fan in one bathroom, brought in the best team of shower doors experts and did other odd jobs all in the most professional and efficient way..

originalText.text: Amazing service!! One of the best handyman companies I’ve used!! They hung the closet doors for my daughter’s room and there is bunch of other work that needs to be done that I'm asking them to come back and do it. I would love to have them around again!! Highly recommended.

text.text: Amazing service!! One of the best handyman companies I’ve used!! They hung the closet doors for my daughter’s room and there is bunch of other work that needs to be done that I'm asking them to come back and do it. I would love to have them around again!! Highly recommended.

originalText.text: Awesome job installing two large air conditioning units. These guys are supremely competent, they care not just about getting the job done, but getting it done right, and they're super friendly, fair and honest. I will definitely be calling them again.
